synesketchXMLparser
Class LexiconUnit

java.lang.Object
  synesketchXMLparser.LexiconUnit

public class LexiconUnit
extends java.lang.Object

A class representing an unit of Synesketch Lexicon. This class provides methods for determing weather instance contains only 'word' and 'generalWeight' fields or not, methods for conversion from Element class from dom4j library to the LexiconUnit class, and also method for creating instance of the LexiconUnit class from given String parameter that contains values for predefined list of attributes separated with space.
